mapper.select: select USERID, OPER, CORPID, TOKEN, SHIPPERADDRESS, SHIPPERADDRESSTYPE, APPKEY, SHIPPERNAME, EBAYIDENTIFY, OPERFLAG, SHIPPEREMAIL, OPERTIME, SHIPPERZIPCODE, SHIPPERPHONE, ORDERSTATUS, UPDATEFLAG, SHIPPERCOMPANYNAME from DB_SFCUSER where USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select USERID, OPER, CORPID, TOKEN, SHIPPERADDRESS, SHIPPERADDRESSTYPE, APPKEY, SHIPPERNAME, EBAYIDENTIFY, OPERFLAG, SHIPPEREMAIL, OPERTIME, SHIPPERZIPCODE, SHIPPERPHONE, ORDERSTATUS, UPDATEFLAG, SHIPPERCOMPANYNAME from DB_SFCUSER
